Nestopia @pretty_version@ Nestopia is a portable open source NES/Famicom emulator. It is designed to be as accurate as possible and supports a large number of peripherals. The hardware is emulated at cycle-by-cycle granularity, ensuring full support for software that does mid-scanline and other timing trickery.
